132.movie_plot: An American Civil War veteran embarks on a journey to rescue his niece from the Comanches.

140.movie_name: In the Heat of the Night (1967)

137.movie_plot: A naive hustler travels from Texas to New York to seek personal fortune but, in the process, finds himself a new friend.

139.movie_plot: A tyrannical ship captain decides to exact revenge on his abused crew after they form a mutiny against him, but the sailor he targets had no hand in it.

141.movie_plot: An emotionally self-destructive boxer's journey through life, as the violence and temper that leads him to the top in the ring destroys his life outside it.

127.movie_plot: The World War II phase of the career of the controversial American general, George S. Patton.

122.movie_plot: A coach with a checkered past and a local drunk train a small town high school basketball team to become a top contender for the championship.

135.movie_plot: A Los Angeles male escort, who mostly caters to an older female clientèle, is accused of a murder which he did not commit.

129.movie_plot: A middle-aged butcher and a school teacher who have given up on the idea of love meet at a dance and fall for each other.

134.movie_plot: A small-town detective searching for a missing man has only one lead: a connection with a New York prostitute.

108.movie_plot: In San Francisco, a group of people discover the human race is being replaced one by one, with clones devoid of emotion.

143.movie_plot: Hilarious documentary on the wildlife of the Namib Desert.

115.movie_plot: A family's home is haunted by a host of ghosts.

0.movie_plot: A criminal pleads insanity after getting into trouble again and once in the mental institution rebels against the oppressive nurse and rallies up the scared patients.

88.movie_plot: An insane general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.
